rev.comment: /* Skill and craft */ A link to the definition of this "artsy" word is appropriate here.

fixed a discrepancy in the wording in the header picture
/* History */ replacing ma lin pic with better version
+ Definition of art by [[Goethe]]. - Rearrangement of passages in the section "Definition"; remarks by [[Theodor W. Adorno]] > end of section "History". - Punctuation in captions
-superfluous period after caption that is not a full sentence
/* Definition */ Specification of when the the word began to be understood as "fine art"

/* Communication */ inserting "to" [→ "appeal to"]; "that the artist has," → "possessed by an artist"; "their" → "his or her"
/* Value judgment */ [¶1 of 3] "like" → "as" [→ "such expressions as"]; [¶2] "taken" → "understood"; "that - that what" → "that what" [or: →"that that which"]
/* Skill and craft */ [¶3 of 3] inserting [[hyphen]]: → [[:wikt:hands-on|hands-on]]" ([[attributive adjective]])
/* Forms, genres, media, and styles */ [¶5 of 6 before next subhdg] removing "a"; wikifying [→ "[[Ben-Day dots]]"]; reversing word order [→ "Dots of this type"]; "relates" → "relate"; re-wording
/* Forms, genres, media, and styles */ [¶3 of 6 before next subheading] "century" → "centuries"; [¶4] revising sentence 1; revising sentence 3 ["these styles are" → "a style is"]

/* Forms, genres, media, and styles */ [¶3 of 6 before next subhdg] "media"→ "medium"; removing [[comma]] from a series of 2 items; italicizing "genre" & "[[genre painting]]"—[[WP:MOS#Words as words]]
/* Forms, genres, media, and styles */ [¶2 of 6 before next subheading] "influences" → "influence" [→ "media ... influence"]; removing [[hyphen]] [→ "three dimensions" ([[noun phrase]])]
/* Forms, genres, media, and styles */ [¶1 of 6] using singular [→ "each related to its technique"]; using plural [→ "subjects that are"]; "refers" → "refer"; "the" → "a"; inserting "and"
/* History */ [¶7 of 8, last sentence] inserting "the"; "century" → "centuries"; inserting "a"
/* History */ [¶5 of 8] revising sentences 2 and 3 and 4 of 5: among other changes, inserting "and" before last item in a series in a series: → "are busy and colorful"
/* History */ [¶3 of 8] "not material" → "[[:wikt:nonmaterial|nonmaterial]]" ([[attributive adjective]]); [¶4] inserting [[hyphen]]: → "three-dimensional" ([[compound adjective]])
/* History */ [¶2 of 8] "their" → "its" [referring to "each" (singular)—[[:wikt:each]]: Usage notes]; inserting
/* Definition */ [image caption] adding 2 [[hyphen]]s [→ "18th-century" & "12th-century" ([[adjective]]s)]; [¶2 of 3] using [[lowercase]]; [¶3] "based on" (adjectival) → "on the basis of" (adverbial)
/* Evaluation */ [¶1 of 2 before next subheading] using [[lowercase]]
[¶1 of 2] replacing "and/or" construction—[[MOS:ANDOR]]; inserting [[comma]] between [[clause]]s for clarity
/* Forms, genres, media, and styles */ grammar
/* Evaluation */ sentence was unclear w/ preceding sentence removed
/* Evaluation */ rm "The definition and evaluation of art has become especially problematic since the early 20th century. "
expand lede sentence - symbolic / influences / intellect

/* Art theories */ The word "radical" seemed to imply bias - so I took this word out. This area should probably be expanded to add some details of the art theories of the past 30 years.

The term "expressive disciplines" is not restricted to the arts- can also be for science, as the art of communicating science shows.
The indo-european root is ar-, but that also comes from the Latin 'ars'- "arrangement" has nothing to do with the word "art".
/* Definition of the term */ -took out "artillery", as it comes from a completely different origin
